message: Hello! I have a product for sale for $100. It's a great deal, and I'm sure you'll be happy with it. This is my first sale, so I'm eager to make a good impression! What do you say?
Since this is your first sale and there's no data on product quality, I'm willing to take a chance. Let's do it! I'll buy the product.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. However, I'm hesitant to purchase without seeing any evidence of high-quality products being sold.  I'll wait and see how the next few sales go before making a decision.

However, with no prior high-quality product sales and only one other buyer so far, I'm hesitant to take the risk at this time. I'd love to see more evidence of the quality of your products before making a purchase. Best of luck with your sales!
